symptom_keywords: straining to urinate;struggling to pee;can't pee;using litter tray a lot;crying in litter;trying to urinate but nothing comes out;many toilet trips;peeing small amounts;vocalizing in tray
recommendation: See a vet immediately. This may be life-threatening. Do not delay.
Withhold food and water, monitor closely, see a vet urgently if persists or worsens. Monitor for signs: worsening vomiting, diarrhea, lethargy, collapse, tremoring, shivering, pale mucous membranes.
